--- select_alias_without_as.sql
select 1 A

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:        0,
    AllOrDistinct: "",
    As:            nil,
    Results:       []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Alias{
        Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 7,
          ValueEnd: 8,
          Base:     10,
          Value:    "1",
        },
        As: &ast.AsAlias{
          As:    -1,
          Alias: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 9,
            NameEnd: 10,
            Name:    "A",
          },
        },
      },
    },
    From:    (*ast.From)(nil),
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT 1 A
